items.content_html: Lightweight web-based application to visualize 3D point cloud data and integrate basic GIS viewing functionality.
items.title: osamu-ad/Voyis-Test-3D: Lightweight web-based application to visualize 3D point cloud data and integrate basic GIS viewing functionality.

items.content_html: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties. It determines whether a number is prime, perfect, Armstrong, odd, or even and provides a fun fact from the Numbers API. Built with nodejs, deployed for public access, and fully documented.
items.title: jerry11671/hng-number-classification-api: A fast and lightweight REST API that classifies numbers based on their mathematical properties. It determines whether a number is prime, perfect, Armstrong, odd, or even and provides a fun fact from the Numbers API. Built with nodejs, deployed for public access, and fully documented.

items.title: bikk-uk/jest-mock-express: A lightweight Jest mock for unit testing Express

items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
items.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: Parsewind is a lightweight utility that transforms Tailwind CSS classes into their corresponding inline CSS styles. It parses the provided Tailwind classes and converts them into a string of standard CSS styles.
items.title: marceloferreira357/parsewind: Parsewind is a lightweight utility that transforms Tailwind CSS classes into their corresponding inline CSS styles. It parses the provided Tailwind classes and converts them into a string of standard CSS styles.

items.content_html: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.
items.title: somritdasgupta/queFork: queFork is a simple, lightweight web API testing platform. Supports REST HTTP requests and real-time websockets protocols.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: TaskMate is a lightweight and intuitive task management app built with React. It helps you keep track of your tasks, move completed tasks to a separate section, and restore them if needed.
items.title: mohamad-m-jamil/TaskMate_React: TaskMate is a lightweight and intuitive task management app built with React. It helps you keep track of your tasks, move completed tasks to a separate section, and restore them if needed.

items.content_html: A modern blog platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, SQLite, and TailwindCSS. This project features Static Generation (SSG), Incremental Static Generation (ISR), Markdown support, SEO optimization, user comments, dark/light mode, and an SQLite database for serverless, lightweight data storage.
items.title: aryanranderiya/Blog-Next.js: A modern blog platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, SQLite, and TailwindCSS. This project features Static Generation (SSG), Incremental Static Generation (ISR), Markdown support, SEO optimization, user comments, dark/light mode, and an SQLite database for serverless, lightweight data storage.
